name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Daniel GOODSON, III, Petitioner

judges: Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Daniel GOODSON, III, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of August, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether passing a counterfeit check purportedly issued by an insurance company constitutes insurance fraud under 18 Pa.C.S. § 4117(a)(2).
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
1 A.3d 867
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Daniel GOODSON, III, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 12, 2010.
